221:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsopari-gaganatala-pratiṣṭhite sapta-ratna pravibha kta-vicitra-ratna-vyūhe mahā-maṇḍalamāḍe viharati sma||
221:4: tatra khalu bhagavān bodhisa[t]tvān āmantrayate sma||
221:5: udgṛhṇīdhavaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ sarva-jagad-dhitārthaṃ||
221:7: saṃsāre saṃsarato yo me kaścid duḥkhā nubhavaḥ sa mā bhūt sa rva samatā'pratisaṃvidita- lakṣa ṇaḥ| [2]
221:8: yaś ca me kaścil laukika-sampatti-sukhānubhavaḥ sa bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-sādhāraṇa-pa ribhogaḥ| [3]
221:9: yac ca me kiñcit pāpa-karm[ā]kuśala-mūlaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ tan mā bhūd
221:11: yāni ca me māra-karmāṇi tāni mā bhūvann aparijñātāny anuttarayā parijñayā|[5]
221:12: yac ca me kiñcit pāramitopasaṃhi taṃ kuśala-mūlaṃ laukika-lokottaraṃ vā tad bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tvānām anuttara-jñānaṃ| [6]
221:13: yā ca me vimuktiḥ sā bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-vimokṣāya|
221:14: mā ca me bhūt saṃsāre nirvāṇe prati-ṣṭhitatā||
221:37: yaḥ kaścit kulapu tro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ triṣ-kṛtvā rātres triṣ-kṛtvā divasya cānuvar (t)
